!Hierarch Asterios: Welcome. I am Asterios, the chosen emmissary of Eva, the mother of all forests and nymphs. Of the 12 chosen hierarchs, I am the last remaining representative in this land of the final sovereign, Valderan. I rule the Elves of light. What brings you to my presence?
